column1: # Madgicx Meta/Facebook Ads Benchmarks by Industry
#   [1] https://madgicx.com/blog/meta-ads-benchmarking (Sep 2025) - "Meta Ads Benchmarks by Industry: 2025 Guide for E-commerce"
#   [2] https://madgicx.com/blog/facebook-ads-cost (2025) - "E-commerce Budget Guide: Facebook Ads Cost in 2025"
#   [3] https://madgicx.com/blog/meta-ads-trend-analysis (2025) - "Meta Ads Trend Analysis: Benchmarks & Optimization Strategies"
#   [4] https://madgicx.com/blog/average-ctr-for-facebook-ads (Oct 2025) - "What's the Average CTR for Facebook Ads in 2025?"
#   [5] https://madgicx.com/blog/industry-benchmarks-for-social-media (Jan 2026) - "Industry Benchmarks for Social Media: A Guide for Agencies"
# Data Year: 2025 (various publication dates Sep 2025 - Jan 2026)
# Notes: Two Madgicx articles report different CPC/CPM values for overlapping industries (different datasets/methodologies).
#   Source [1] focuses on e-commerce ad performance benchmarks; Source [2] focuses on ad cost benchmarks.
#   Where both sources provide data, both are listed as separate rows with source noted.
#   Some CTR data in source [4] originates from WordStream 2017 data cited by Madgicx.
